summary: A companion I made named Fantis Keldar. He is a Two handed warrior.
descriptionHtml:
~~~ Info ~~~
-Stand Alone Follower
-Marriageable
-Comes with Iron Armor (No Helm) and a Iron Greatsword.
-Located in Morthal\'s Moorside Inn
-Scales in level (10 Minimum, 81 Maximum)

Perks: Barbarian, Deep Wounds, Cushioned, Sweep, Tower of Strength, Matching Set (Heavy).  

Combat Style: Warrior, Two Handed.



~~~ Mods used ~~~
Nothing is required to have yet, but how I made him look in the screenshots is thanks to these mods:

Better Males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

Beards by lthot:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363

~~~ Updates ~~~
Version 1.05: Added Face Gen Data, AI Package, Changed Perks.
Version 1.00: Created, tested a bit, and uploaded.


~~~ Credits ~~~ 
Chris57, for better males
lthot for Beards
My older brother, for creating the \"Base\" character
My boyfriend for helping me test the file
Random internet tutorials on creating custom companions
ripple for the great feedback
author: Fantil Swift
